com.twitter.heron.scheduler.api

Interface IScheduler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalScheduler, MesosScheduler, Nullity.NullScheduler

    public interface IScheduler
    Scheduler object responsible for bringing up topology. Will be instantiated using no-arg constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialize(LaunchContext context)
      This will initialize scheduler using config file.
      boolean onActivate(Scheduler.ActivateTopologyRequest request)
      Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to activate topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.ActivateTopologyRequest.
      boolean onDeactivate(Scheduler.DeactivateTopologyRequest request)
      Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to deactivate topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.DeactivateTopologyRequest.
      void onHealthCheck(java.lang.String healthCheckResponse)
      When health check is received from a host, this method will get called.
      boolean onKill(Scheduler.KillTopologyRequest request)
      Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to kill topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.KillTopologyRequest.
      boolean onRestart(Scheduler.RestartTopologyRequest request)
      Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to restart topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.RestartTopologyRequest.
      void schedule(PackingPlan packing)
      This method will be called after initialize.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(LaunchContext context)
        This will initialize scheduler using config file. Will be called during start.

      • schedule

        void schedule(PackingPlan packing)
        This method will be called after initialize. It is responsible for grabbing resource to launch executor and make sure they get launched.

        Parameters:
        packing - Initial mapping suggested by running packing algorithm.

      • onHealthCheck

        void onHealthCheck(java.lang.String healthCheckResponse)
        When health check is received from a host, this method will get called.
        Parameters:
        healthCheckResponse - Executor response from health-check.

      • onKill

        boolean onKill(Scheduler.KillTopologyRequest request)
        Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to kill topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.KillTopologyRequest. The SchedulerServer would parse the request body and feed with this method. It would be invoked in the executors of SchedulerServer.
        Parameters:
        request - The KillTopologyRequest sent from local heron-cli
        Returns:
        true if the IScheduler kills the topology successfully. SchedulerServer would send KillTopologyResponse correspondingly according to this method's return value.

      • onActivate

        boolean onActivate(Scheduler.ActivateTopologyRequest request)
        Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to activate topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.ActivateTopologyRequest. The SchedulerServer would parse the request body and feed with this method. It would be invoked in the executors of SchedulerServer.
        Parameters:
        request - The ActivateTopologyRequest sent from local heron-cli
        Returns:
        true if the IScheduler activates the topology successfully. SchedulerServer would send ActivateTopologyResponse correspondingly according to this method's return value.

      • onDeactivate

        boolean onDeactivate(Scheduler.DeactivateTopologyRequest request)
        Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to deactivate topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.DeactivateTopologyRequest. The SchedulerServer would parse the request body and feed with this method. It would be invoked in the executors of SchedulerServer.
        Parameters:
        request - The DeactivateTopologyRequest sent from local heron-cli
        Returns:
        true if the IScheduler deactivates the topology successfully. SchedulerServer would send DeactivateTopologyResponse correspondingly according to this method's return value.

      • onRestart

        boolean onRestart(Scheduler.RestartTopologyRequest request)
        Called by SchedulerServer when it receives a http request to restart topology, while the http request body would be the protobuf Scheduler.RestartTopologyRequest. The SchedulerServer would parse the request body and feed with this method. It would be invoked in the executors of SchedulerServer.
        Parameters:
        request - The RestartTopologyRequest sent from local heron-cli
        Returns:
        true if the IScheduler restarts the topology successfully. SchedulerServer would send RestartTopologyResponse correspondingly according to this method's return value.
